title: MIT STEM Excellence Scholarship
description: Designed for high-achieving students pursuing undergraduate STEM degrees, with emphasis on innovation and research.
eligibility: Open to first-year applicants globally with strong math and science backgrounds and community engagement.
benefits: Partial tuition coverage, $10,000 research grant, and mentorship with MIT faculty.

title: University of Toronto Global Health Award
description: Supports doctoral candidates driving research in global health equity and public policy interventions.
eligibility: Applicants must hold a relevant master's degree and provide a research proposal aligned with global health.
benefits: Full tuition, CAD $25,000 annual stipend, conference travel support, and health insurance.

title: University of Melbourne Research Scholarship
description: Funding for postgraduate research students focusing on climate resilience and sustainable innovation.
eligibility: International students with a research proposal and supervisor endorsement.
benefits: Tuition waiver, $10,000 living allowance, and access to innovation labs.

title: Sciences Po Social Impact Grant
description: Encourages undergraduates committed to social justice, civic engagement, and public policy solutions.
eligibility: Students with evidence of community leadership and strong academic performance.

title: University of Cape Town Innovation Scholarship
description: Celebrates creative thinkers working on design solutions that improve infrastructure and community wellbeing.
eligibility: Portfolio submission required; open to international applicants with a design background.
benefits: Partial tuition, housing support, and access to innovation incubators.
